countries.name: Afghanistan
countries.fact: The official name of Afghanistan is the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan.

countries.name: Albania
countries.fact: Albania is one of the few countries in the world where there are more bunkers than people.

countries.name: Algeria
countries.fact: Algeria is the largest country in Africa and the Arab world.

countries.name: Andorra
countries.fact: Andorra is the only country in the world with Catalan as its official language.

countries.name: Angola
countries.fact: Angola is home to one of the world's largest waterfalls, the Tazua Falls.

countries.name: Antigua and Barbuda
countries.fact: Antigua and Barbuda is known for having 365 beaches, one for each day of the year.

countries.name: Argentina
countries.fact: Argentina is the birthplace of the Tango dance.

countries.name: Armenia
countries.fact: Armenia is one of the oldest wine-producing countries in the world.

countries.name: Australia
countries.fact: Australia is home to the world's largest reef system, the Great Barrier Reef.

countries.name: Austria
countries.fact: Austria's national flag is one of the oldest in the world, dating back to 1191.

countries.name: Azerbaijan
countries.fact: Azerbaijan is often referred to as the 'Land of Fire' due to its long history of Zoroastrianism and natural gas reserves.

countries.name: Bahamas
countries.fact: The Bahamas is made up of 700 islands, though only around 30 are inhabited.

countries.name: Bahrain
countries.fact: Bahrain is home to the ancient civilization of Dilmun, which dates back to the 3rd millennium BCE.

countries.name: Bangladesh
countries.fact: Bangladesh is the world's largest producer of jute, often referred to as the 'golden fiber.'

countries.name: Barbados
countries.fact: Barbados is the birthplace of rum.

countries.name: Belarus
countries.fact: Belarus is home to the largest forest in Europe, the Belovezhskaya Pushcha National Park.

countries.name: Belgium
countries.fact: Belgium is the world's largest exporter of chocolate.

countries.name: Belize
countries.fact: Belize has the lowest population density in Central America.

countries.name: Benin
countries.fact: Benin is the birthplace of Voodoo, an African religion practiced by millions worldwide.

countries.name: Bhutan
countries.fact: Bhutan measures its success in Gross National Happiness rather than Gross Domestic Product (GDP).

countries.name: Bolivia
countries.fact: Bolivia has the highest capital city in the world, La Paz, at 3,650 meters (11,975 feet) above sea level.

countries.name: Bosnia and Herzegovina
countries.fact: Bosnia and Herzegovina is home to one of the last remaining virgin forests in Europe, the Perucica Forest.

countries.name: Botswana
countries.fact: Botswana is home to the world's largest population of African elephants.

countries.name: Brazil
countries.fact: Brazil contains approximately 60% of the Amazon Rainforest.

countries.name: Brunei
countries.fact: Brunei has one of the highest standards of living in the world due to its significant oil and natural gas reserves.

countries.name: Bulgaria
countries.fact: Bulgaria is one of the oldest countries in Europe, established in 681 AD.

countries.name: Burkina Faso
countries.fact: Burkina Faso translates to 'Land of Honest Men' and is known for its traditional music and dance.

countries.name: Burundi
countries.fact: Burundi is one of the world's poorest countries, but it has a rich cultural heritage.

countries.name: Cabo Verde
countries.fact: Cabo Verde is named after the westernmost cape of Africa, Cabo Verde.

countries.name: Cambodia
countries.fact: Cambodia is home to Angkor Wat, the largest religious monument in the world.

countries.name: Cameroon
countries.fact: Cameroon is sometimes referred to as 'Africa in miniature' due to its diverse landscapes.

countries.name: Canada
countries.fact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.

countries.name: Central African Republic
countries.fact: The Central African Republic is home to one of the highest concentrations of wildlife in Africa.

countries.name: Chad
countries.fact: Chad is home to the Sahara Desert's largest body of water, Lake Chad.

countries.name: Chile
countries.fact: Chile is the world's longest country, stretching over 4,300 kilometers (2,670 miles) from north to south.

countries.name: China
countries.fact: China is the world's most populous country, with over 1.4 billion people.

countries.name: Colombia
countries.fact: Colombia is one of the most biodiverse countries in the world, home to over 10% of the world's species.

countries.name: Comoros
countries.fact: Comoros is known as the 'Perfume Islands' because of its fragrant plants.

countries.name: Congo (Brazzaville)
countries.fact: Congo is the fourth-largest oil producer in sub-Saharan Africa.

countries.name: Costa Rica
countries.fact: Costa Rica aims to be the first carbon-neutral country in the world by 2021.

countries.name: Croatia
countries.fact: Croatia has over a thousand islands along its Adriatic coast.

countries.name: Cuba
countries.fact: Cuba has the highest doctor-to-patient ratio in the world.

countries.name: Cyprus
countries.fact: Cyprus is the birthplace of the mythical Greek goddess of love, Aphrodite.

countries.name: Czech Republic
countries.fact: The Czech Republic has the highest beer consumption per capita in the world.

countries.name: Democratic Republic of the Congo
countries.fact: The Democratic Republic of the Congo is the second-largest country in Africa by land area.

countries.name: Denmark
countries.fact: Denmark is considered one of the happiest countries in the world.

countries.name: Djibouti
countries.fact: Djibouti is home to one of the saltiest bodies of water in the world, Lake Assal.

countries.name: Dominica
countries.fact: Dominica is known as the 'Nature Isle of the Caribbean' due to its lush rainforests and abundant wildlife.

countries.name: Dominican Republic
countries.fact: The Dominican Republic is home to the first permanent European settlement in the Americas, Santo Domingo.

countries.name: East Timor
countries.fact: East Timor is one of the world's newest countries, gaining independence from Indonesia in 2002.

countries.name: Ecuador
countries.fact: Ecuador is the closest country to space, thanks to the bulge of the Earth at the equator.

countries.name: Egypt
countries.fact: Egypt is home to the world's oldest known ancient civilization, the Ancient Egyptians.

countries.name: El Salvador
countries.fact: El Salvador is the smallest and most densely populated country in Central America.

countries.name: Equatorial Guinea
countries.fact: Equatorial Guinea is the only country in Africa where Spanish is an official language.

countries.name: Eritrea
countries.fact: Eritrea is one of the few countries in the world with no McDonald's.

countries.name: Estonia
countries.fact: Estonia is the birthplace of Skype.

countries.name: Eswatini
countries.fact: Eswatini is one of the world's last remaining absolute monarchies.

countries.name: Ethiopia
countries.fact: Ethiopia has its own calendar, which is seven to eight years behind the Gregorian calendar.

countries.name: Fiji
countries.fact: Fiji is made up of over 330 islands, of which only about one-third are inhabited.

countries.name: Finland
countries.fact: Finland is known as the 'Land of a Thousand Lakes,' but in reality, there are over 180,000 lakes in the country.

countries.name: France
countries.fact: France is the most visited country in the world.

countries.name: Gabon
countries.fact: Gabon is one of the most forested countries in Africa, with over 80% of its land covered in forests.

countries.name: Gambia
countries.fact: The Gambia is the smallest country on mainland Africa.

countries.name: Georgia
countries.fact: Georgia is known as the birthplace of wine, with evidence of winemaking dating back over 8,000 years.

countries.name: Germany
countries.fact: Germany is home to the world's oldest brewery, the Weihenstephan Brewery, which has been operating since 1040 AD.

countries.name: Ghana
countries.fact: Ghana was the first country in sub-Saharan Africa to gain independence from colonial rule.

countries.name: Greece
countries.fact: Greece has over 2,000 islands, but only around 170 are inhabited.

countries.name: Grenada
countries.fact: Grenada is known as the 'Spice Isle' due to its production of nutmeg and mace.

countries.name: Guatemala
countries.fact: Guatemala is home to one of the largest and most well-preserved Mayan sites in the world, Tikal.

countries.name: Guinea
countries.fact: Guinea is known for its rich natural resources, including bauxite, iron ore, and gold.

countries.name: Guinea-Bissau
countries.fact: Guinea-Bissau is one of the few countries in Africa where Portuguese is the official language.

countries.name: Guyana
countries.fact: Guyana is home to the world's largest single-drop waterfall by volume, Kaieteur Falls.

countries.name: Haiti
countries.fact: Haiti is the most populous country in the Caribbean.

countries.name: Honduras
countries.fact: Honduras is home to the second-largest barrier reef in the world, the Mesoamerican Barrier Reef.

countries.name: Hungary
countries.fact: Hungary is home to the largest thermal water cave system in the world, the Cave Bath of Miskolc-Tapolca.

countries.name: Iceland
countries.fact: Iceland is one of the most geologically active countries in the world, with numerous volcanoes and geysers.

countries.name: India
countries.fact: India is the world's largest democracy.

countries.name: Indonesia
countries.fact: Indonesia has the highest number of active volcanoes in the world, with over 130.

countries.name: Iran
countries.fact: Iran is home to one of the world's oldest civilizations, dating back over 6,000 years.

countries.name: Iraq
countries.fact: Iraq is often referred to as the 'Cradle of Civilization' due to its historical significance.

countries.name: Ireland
countries.fact: Ireland has the highest per capita consumption of tea in the world.

countries.name: Israel
countries.fact: Israel has the highest number of museums per capita in the world.

countries.name: Italy
countries.fact: Italy is home to the most UNESCO World Heritage Sites in the world.

countries.name: Jamaica
countries.fact: Jamaica is the birthplace of reggae music.

countries.name: Japan
countries.fact: Japan is the world's largest consumer of Amazon rainforest timber.

countries.name: Jordan
countries.fact: Jordan is home to one of the New Seven Wonders of the World, Petra.

countries.name: Kazakhstan
countries.fact: Kazakhstan is the world's largest landlocked country.

countries.name: Kenya
countries.fact: Kenya is home to the Maasai Mara National Reserve, famous for its annual wildebeest migration.

countries.name: Kiribati
countries.fact: Kiribati is the only country in the world to fall into all four hemispheres.

countries.name: Kosovo
countries.fact: Kosovo is one of the youngest countries in the world, having declared independence from Serbia in 2008.

countries.name: Kuwait
countries.fact: Kuwait is one of the hottest countries in the world, with temperatures regularly exceeding 50°C (122°F) in the summer.

countries.name: Kyrgyzstan
countries.fact: Kyrgyzstan is home to the world's second-largest alpine lake, Issyk-Kul.

countries.name: Laos
countries.fact: Laos is the most bombed country per capita in history, a legacy of the Vietnam War.

countries.name: Latvia
countries.fact: Latvia has the highest percentage of women to men in the world, with 54% of the population being female.

countries.name: Lebanon
countries.fact: Lebanon is one of the world's oldest continuously inhabited countries.

countries.name: Lesotho
countries.fact: Lesotho is the only country in the world entirely above 1,000 meters (3,281 feet) in elevation.

countries.name: Liberia
countries.fact: Liberia is Africa's oldest republic, established by freed American and Caribbean slaves in 1847.

countries.name: Libya
countries.fact: Libya is home to the ruins of the ancient Greek city of Cyrene, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

countries.name: Liechtenstein
countries.fact: Liechtenstein is the world's sixth smallest country.

countries.name: Lithuania
countries.fact: Lithuania has one of the fastest internet speeds in the world.

countries.name: Luxembourg
countries.fact: Luxembourg is the only Grand Duchy in the world.

countries.name: Madagascar
countries.fact: Madagascar is home to approximately 5% of the world's plant and animal species, many of which are found nowhere else on Earth.

countries.name: Malawi
countries.fact: Lake Malawi, also known as Lake Nyasa, covers about a third of Malawi's area and is the third-largest lake in Africa.

countries.name: Malaysia
countries.fact: Malaysia is one of the world's top producers of palm oil.

countries.name: Maldives
countries.fact: The Maldives is the lowest country in the world, with an average elevation of just 1.5 meters (4 feet 11 inches) above sea level.

countries.name: Mali
countries.fact: Mali is home to the ancient city of Timbuktu, once a center of learning and trade in the region.

countries.name: Malta
countries.fact: Malta is the smallest EU member state in both population and area.

countries.name: Marshall Islands
countries.fact: The Marshall Islands is one of the world's youngest nations, gaining independence in 1986.

countries.name: Mauritania
countries.fact: Mauritania is one of the least densely populated countries in the world.

countries.name: Mauritius
countries.fact: Mauritius is known for its stunning beaches, coral reefs, and lagoons.

countries.name: Mexico
countries.fact: Mexico City is built on top of the ruins of the Aztec capital, Tenochtitlan.

countries.name: Micronesia
countries.fact: Micronesia is made up of over 600 islands scattered across the Pacific Ocean.

countries.name: Moldova
countries.fact: Moldova is one of the least visited countries in Europe.

countries.name: Monaco
countries.fact: Monaco is the second-smallest country in the world, after Vatican City.

countries.name: Mongolia
countries.fact: Mongolia is the least densely populated country in the world.

countries.name: Montenegro
countries.fact: Montenegro's name means 'Black Mountain' and is named after the dense forests that cover its mountains.

countries.name: Morocco
countries.fact: Morocco is home to the world's largest solar power plant, Noor Ouarzazate.

countries.name: Mozambique
countries.fact: Mozambique is home to some of the last remaining populations of dugongs, also known as sea cows.

countries.name: Myanmar
countries.fact: Myanmar is home to the world's largest book, the Kuthodaw Pagoda in Mandalay.

countries.name: Namibia
countries.fact: Namibia is home to the world's oldest desert, the Namib Desert.

countries.name: Nauru
countries.fact: Nauru is the smallest island nation in the world.

countries.name: Nepal
countries.fact: Nepal is home to the world's highest mountain, Mount Everest.

countries.name: Netherlands
countries.fact: The Netherlands is one of the world's largest exporters of flowers, particularly tulips.

countries.name: New Zealand
countries.fact: New Zealand was the first country in the world to grant women the right to vote, in 1893.

countries.name: Nicaragua
countries.fact: Nicaragua has two large freshwater lakes, Lake Managua and Lake Nicaragua, the latter of which is home to the world's only freshwater sharks.

countries.name: Niger
countries.fact: Niger is the hottest country in the world, with an average temperature of 30°C (86°F).

countries.name: Nigeria
countries.fact: Nigeria is home to Nollywood, the second-largest film industry in the world after Bollywood.

countries.name: North Korea
countries.fact: North Korea is one of the most isolated and secretive countries in the world.

countries.name: North Macedonia
countries.fact: North Macedonia was part of Yugoslavia until its independence in 1991.

countries.name: Norway
countries.fact: Norway is home to the world's longest road tunnel, the Laerdal Tunnel.

countries.name: Oman
countries.fact: Oman is home to some of the oldest human settlements in the Arabian Peninsula.

countries.name: Pakistan
countries.fact: Pakistan has the world's second-highest peak, K2, also known as Mount Godwin-Austen.

countries.name: Palau
countries.fact: Palau is known for its beautiful coral reefs and world-class diving spots.

countries.name: Palestine
countries.fact: Palestine has the oldest olive trees in the world, some dating back over 2,000 years.

countries.name: Panama
countries.fact: Panama is home to the Panama Canal, one of the world's most important waterways.

countries.name: Papua New Guinea
countries.fact: Papua New Guinea is one of the most culturally diverse countries in the world, with over 800 languages spoken.

countries.name: Paraguay
countries.fact: Paraguay is one of the few countries in the world with two official languages: Spanish and Guarani.

countries.name: Peru
countries.fact: Peru is home to Machu Picchu, one of the New Seven Wonders of the World.

countries.name: Philippines
countries.fact: The Philippines is the world's leading producer of coconuts.

countries.name: Poland
countries.fact: Poland is the birthplace of astronomer Nicolaus Copernicus, who proposed that the Earth orbits the sun.

countries.name: Portugal
countries.fact: Portugal is home to the oldest bookstore in the world, Livraria Bertrand, which has been operating since 1732.

countries.name: Qatar
countries.fact: Qatar is the richest country in the world per capita.

countries.name: Romania
countries.fact: Romania is home to one of the largest and best-preserved deltas in Europe, the Danube Delta.

countries.name: Russia
countries.fact: Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.

countries.name: Rwanda
countries.fact: Rwanda is known as the 'Land of a Thousand Hills' due to its hilly and mountainous terrain.

countries.name: Saint Kitts and Nevis
countries.fact: Saint Kitts and Nevis is the smallest country in the Western Hemisphere in both area and population.

countries.name: Saint Lucia
countries.fact: Saint Lucia is the only country in the world named after a woman, Saint Lucy of Syracuse.

countries.name: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
countries.fact: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines is made up of 32 islands and cays.

countries.name: Samoa
countries.fact: Samoa is the first country in the world to see the sunrise every day.

countries.name: San Marino
countries.fact: San Marino is the world's oldest surviving republic.

countries.name: Sao Tome and Principe
countries.fact: Sao Tome and Principe is the second-smallest country in Africa by land area.

countries.name: Saudi Arabia
countries.fact: Saudi Arabia is the largest country in the world without a river.

countries.name: Senegal
countries.fact: Senegal is the westernmost country on the African mainland.

countries.name: Serbia
countries.fact: Serbia is home to one of the largest Orthodox churches in the world, the Saint Sava Cathedral.

countries.name: Seychelles
countries.fact: Seychelles is the only country in the world with a granite mountain range.

countries.name: Sierra Leone
countries.fact: Sierra Leone is known for its diamond mines, though it is also one of the world's poorest countries.

countries.name: Singapore
countries.fact: Singapore is the world's only island city-state.

countries.name: Slovakia
countries.fact: Slovakia is the world's largest per capita car producer.

countries.name: Slovenia
countries.fact: Slovenia is home to the world's oldest wooden wheel, dating back over 5,000 years.

countries.name: Solomon Islands
countries.fact: The Solomon Islands is home to some of the most biologically diverse coral reefs in the world.

countries.name: Somalia
countries.fact: Somalia is believed to be the home of the ancient Land of Punt, a trading partner of ancient Egypt.

countries.name: South Africa
countries.fact: South Africa is home to the world's largest land mammal, the African elephant, and the largest bird, the ostrich.

countries.name: South Korea
countries.fact: South Korea is known as the 'Land of the Morning Calm.'

countries.name: South Sudan
countries.fact: South Sudan is the youngest country in the world, gaining independence from Sudan in 2011.

countries.name: Spain
countries.fact: Spain is the second most visited country in the world, after France.

countries.name: Sri Lanka
countries.fact: Sri Lanka is home to the world's oldest recorded tree, the Sri Maha Bodhi, which is over 2,000 years old.

countries.name: Sudan
countries.fact: Sudan has more pyramids than Egypt.

countries.name: Suriname
countries.fact: Suriname is one of the most ethnically diverse countries in the world, with over 20 distinct ethnic groups.

countries.name: Sweden
countries.fact: Sweden has the highest number of McDonald's restaurants per capita in Europe.

countries.name: Switzerland
countries.fact: Switzerland has more Nobel Prize winners and Olympic medalists per capita than any other country.

countries.name: Syria
countries.fact: Syria is home to some of the world's oldest continuously inhabited cities, including Damascus and Aleppo.

countries.name: Taiwan
countries.fact: Taiwan is home to the world's tallest building, the Taipei 101.

countries.name: Tajikistan
countries.fact: Tajikistan is home to some of the highest mountains in the world, including the Pamir Mountains.

countries.name: Tanzania
countries.fact: Tanzania is home to Mount Kilimanjaro, the highest peak in Africa.

countries.name: Thailand
countries.fact: Thailand is the only country in Southeast Asia to never have been colonized by a European power.

countries.name: Togo
countries.fact: Togo is known for its vibrant music and dance, particularly the Gbedu.

countries.name: Tonga
countries.fact: Tonga is the only monarchy in the Pacific.

countries.name: Trinidad and Tobago
countries.fact: Trinidad and Tobago is the birthplace of calypso music.

countries.name: Tunisia
countries.fact: Tunisia is the northernmost country in Africa.

countries.name: Turkey
countries.fact: Turkey is the only country in the world that is located on two continents, Europe and Asia.

countries.name: Turkmenistan
countries.fact: Turkmenistan is one of the least visited countries in the world.

countries.name: Tuvalu
countries.fact: Tuvalu is the fourth smallest country in the world.

countries.name: Uganda
countries.fact: Uganda is known as the 'Pearl of Africa' for its natural beauty and diverse wildlife.

countries.name: Ukraine
countries.fact: Ukraine is the largest country entirely in Europe.

countries.name: United Arab Emirates
countries.fact: The United Arab Emirates is home to the world's tallest building, the Burj Khalifa.

countries.name: United Kingdom
countries.fact: The United Kingdom is made up of four countries: England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland.

countries.name: United States
countries.fact: The United States has the world's largest economy.

countries.name: Uruguay
countries.fact: Uruguay is the first country in the world to legalize marijuana.

countries.name: Uzbekistan
countries.fact: Uzbekistan is home to some of the oldest cities in the world, including Samarkand and Bukhara.

countries.name: Vanuatu
countries.fact: Vanuatu is known for its active volcanoes and traditional Melanesian culture.

countries.name: Vatican City
countries.fact: Vatican City is the smallest independent state in the world by both area and population.

countries.name: Venezuela
countries.fact: Venezuela has the world's highest waterfall, Angel Falls, which drops 979 meters (3,212 feet).

countries.name: Vietnam
countries.fact: Vietnam is the world's second-largest coffee producer, after Brazil.

countries.name: Yemen
countries.fact: Yemen is the only country in the Arabian Peninsula that is a republic.

countries.name: Zambia
countries.fact: Zambia is home to one of the largest waterfalls in the world, Victoria Falls.

countries.name: Zimbabwe
countries.fact: Zimbabwe has the highest literacy rate in Africa.
